data.meanings: To swallow, gulp down food, glut. Instinct, natural feeling, inspiration.
data.sentence: The word فَأَلْهَمَهَا comes from the root ل ه م and is associated with the meanings: To swallow, gulp down food, glut. Instinct, natural feeling, inspiration.

data.meanings: cut/divide lengthwise, break open, vent, incline/decline/deviate, dawn/sunrise/daybreak, source, abundantly and suddenly, ample bounty/generosity, a place from which water flows.
data.sentence: The word فُجُورَهَا comes from the root ف ج ر and is associated with the meanings: cut/divide lengthwise, break open, vent, incline/decline/deviate, dawn/sunrise/daybreak, source, abundantly and suddenly, ample bounty/generosity, a place from which water flows.

data.meanings: to protect, save, preserve, ward off, guard against evil and calamity, be secure, take as a shield, regard the duty. muttaqii - one who guard against evil and against that which harms and injures and is regardful of his duty towards human beings and God.
data.sentence: The word وَتَقْوَاهَا comes from the root و ق ي and is associated with the meanings: to protect, save, preserve, ward off, guard against evil and calamity, be secure, take as a shield, regard the duty. muttaqii - one who guard against evil and against that which harms and injures and is regardful of his duty towards human beings and God.
